data.name: DonationUploadStep1
data.value: 1. Fill in the donation information in the

data.name: DonationUploadStep2
data.value: 2. Save the file in csv format. (Warning message may display when saving the file, press Yes to continue the saving process.)

data.name: DonationUploadStep3
data.value: 3. Open the file in a text editor such as notepad.

data.name: DonationUploadStep4
data.value: 4. Copy the whole contents of the file and paste into the text box below.
